scripts.deploy: anchor deploy -p splurge --provider.cluster d --program-keypair target/deploy/splurge-keypair.json --provider.wallet splurge-wallet.json
scripts.idl:sync: cp target/idl/splurge.json app/src/idl/splurge.json; cp target/types/splurge.ts app/src/types/splurge.ts
scripts.idl:init: anchor idl init $(anchor keys list | grep 'splurge:' | awk '{print $2}') -f target/idl/splurge.json --provider.cluster d --provider.wallet splurge-wallet.json
scripts.idl:upgrade: anchor idl upgrade $(anchor keys list | grep 'splurge:' | awk '{print $2}') -f target/idl/splurge.json --provider.cluster d --provider.wallet splurge-wallet.json
